You might also want to take a look at WebTest. It supports declarative 
specification of web tests in XML and uses HtmlUnit under the covers.
It handles JavaScript better than HttpUnit/jWebTest. There has been
active JavaScript support added to HtmlUnit by some of the WebTest
contributors over the last few months.

    http://webtest.canoo.com

Regards, Paul.
subject: Re: [junit] Automated Testing for Web applications - Any Experiences ?
